name: com.klazapp.devicelocationpermission
displayName: Unity Device Location Permission Utility Private
description: Streamline camera permission management in your Unity projects with the DeviceCameraPermissionHandler utility. Designed to handle camera permissions seamlessly across iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, and potentially WebGL, this tool ensures that integrating camera functionalities into your Unity applications is effortless and efficient. It features platform-specific implementations and editor compatibility for robust testing and development.
